property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.CREATE
property.description: ACL for create-key operations. If the user is not in the GET ACL, the key material is not returned as part of the response.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.ROLLOVER
property.description: ACL for rollover-key operations. If the user does is not in the GET ACL, the key material is not returned as part of the response.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.GET
property.description: ACL for get-key-version and get-current-key operations.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.GET_METADATA
property.description: ACL for get-key-metadata and get-keys-metadata operations.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.SET_KEY_MATERIAL
property.description: Complementary ACL for CREATE and ROLLOVER operations to allow the client to provide the key material when creating or rolling a key.

property.name: default.key.acl.MANAGEMENT
property.description: default ACL for MANAGEMENT operations for all key acls that are not explicitly defined.

property.name: default.key.acl.GENERATE_EEK
property.description: default ACL for GENERATE_EEK operations for all key acls that are not explicitly defined.

property.name: default.key.acl.DECRYPT_EEK
property.description: default ACL for DECRYPT_EEK operations for all key acls that are not explicitly defined.

property.name: default.key.acl.READ
property.description: default ACL for READ operations for all key acls that are not explicitly defined.
